Title: Establishes certain offenses relating to crypto fraud
Summary: Establishes the offenses of virtual token fraud, illegal rug pulls, private key fraud and fraudulent failure to disclose interest in virtual tokens.
LawCode: Add Title K Art 191 §§191.00 - 191.25, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing certain offenses relating to crypto fraud
